name: Mine Upgrade Deluxe
description:
Welcome to Mine Upgrade Deluxe! Mine your way through a longer tunnel with a wider variety of upgrades, equipment and collectables to begin and idle your way to the top! Sell precious and rare finds to the market to stack up your coins. Complete the game by achieving each task, earning prizes and earning trophies!

Deluxe Features:
- 16 Equipment Types! (Lite has 11)
- 15 Rock Types! (Lite has 9)
- 60 Upgrades! (Lite has 14)
- 12 Collectables! (Lite has 6)
- 46 Achievements!
- 10 Filter Effects!
- Infinite Cargo Upgrades!
- Infinite Auto Selling Feature!
- Trophies!
- Statistics for competitive play!
- Coin Pack Discounts!

Think you have what it takes?
